name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 61: The Quiz 2
overview: Simple 1500 Series vol. 61 - The Quiz 2 is the second quiz game in the Simple 1500 series and also features more than 15000 different questions of different subjects, the game features also a 2 player mode. Game modes: - Survival Mode - Vs Mode - Simulation Mode: Conquer other players territories winning them in quiz battles.
